outputs.output_descr: The project aims at establishing the foundations of the cooperation between the National Youth Secretariat and the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) in the organization of the Conference of Youth for Rio +20, as well as provide technical and logistical support to the Interest Group of the United Nations Children and Youth Conference on Sustainable Development in the exercise of its powers, including preparatory actions such as structuring events logistics, organizing side events, social inclusion activities and promoting sustainability projects.

project_descr: Suporte à realização da Conferência de Juventude  YOUTH BLAST
project_title: BRA/12/004 - Suporte realização Conferência de Juventude
